author: Touria Izri Global News
title: Parliamentarians who allegedly colluded with foreign states are ‘traitors’: Singh - National | Globalnews.ca
text: NDP Leader Jagmeet Singh says parliamentarians who allegedly “wittingly” collaborated with foreign governments are “traitors to the country.” Singh spoke Thursday after reviewing the unredacted version of an explosive report from the National Security and Intelligence Committee of Parliamentarians (NSICOP), which was released last week. “There are a number of MPs who have knowingly provided help to foreign governments, some to the detriment of Canada and Canadians,” Singh told reporters. “What they’re doing is unethical. It is in some cases against the law,” said the NDP leader. “They are indeed traitors to the country.” “The conclusions that are publicly available suggest that there are a number of MPs that were engaged in activities that were unethical, in some cases illegal or criminal. After having read the unredacted version. I agree with that finding.” His comments stand in contrast to Green Party Leader Elizabeth May’s remarks after reading the full NSICOP report. Both leaders have security clearances to review the material. May was the first opposition leader to read the unredacted document and said she was “vastly relieved” at what she says she found there, calling the “media firestorm” surrounding the NSICOP report “overblown.” [sent to your email, as it happens.](javascript:void(0)) But Singh said he is not “relieved” after reading the full text. “I am more concerned today … than I was yesterday.” May had told reporters that, “I have no worries about anyone in the House of Commons. There is no list of MPs who have shown disloyalty to Canada.” The New Democrat declined to answer repeated questions about whether May was wrong, instead laying blame at the feet of Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, who received the report back in March, and Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre, who has not requested a security clearance to read the document. “I’m more disturbed by what I’ve learned, and it really does highlight to me the failure of leadership of both Justin Trudeau and Pierre Poilievre,” said Singh. So far, Public Safety Minister Dominic LeBlanc has declined to provide the names of parliamentarians who “wittingly” collaborated with foreign governments, or any details beyond what’s in the public version of the NSICOP report. The public safety minister says he is bound by Canada’s official secrets act, and revealing their identities would break the law and potentially jeopardize national security.

author: Guoke
title: 有一种蓝叫防城港蓝
text:
市民在郁郁葱葱的红树林旁拍照打卡。
西湾海堤步道成为市民运动休闲的好去处。
俯瞰防城港市行政中心区，蓝天碧海，海堤步道与成片的红树林相映成趣，勾勒出一幅人与自然和谐共生的生动画面。
广西云-广西日报记者 苑长军 防城港市融媒体中心记者 朱新华 卢镰太 文/图
三月的防城港，乍暖还寒，满城苍翠，碧波万顷。
当晨雾初散，漫步在北部湾海洋文化公园，红花绿树，葱葱郁郁的红树林、展翅飞翔的白鹭、蔚蓝的大海……眼前的美景勾勒出一幅绿意盎然的生态画卷。
“防城港的生态环境金不换，水好、空气好、风景美，‘城在海中、海在城中、人在景中’全海景生态海湾城市的美誉名符其实，我们生活在这里很幸福。”长期坚持在北部湾海洋文化公园锻炼的防城港市民黄胜涛感慨。
防城港市位于我国陆地海岸线最西南端，南临北部湾，北靠十万大山，拥有538公里海岸线、百里金色海滩，大陆自然岸线保有率达到36.7%，森林覆盖率达62.41%，生态资源得天独厚，享有国家园林城市、国家森林城市、中国氧都、中国白鹭之乡、中国长寿之乡等美誉。
近年来，防城港市深入贯彻落实习近平生态文明思想，践行“绿水青山就是金山银山”理念，坚定不移走生态优先、绿色发展之路，执“绿”为笔，坚持海陆空统筹，把推进绿色发展融入经济社会发展各方面和全过程，持续推动传统产业高端化、智能化、绿色化发展，以独特的笔触书写着绿色发展的生态诗篇。
海洋是孕育生命的摇篮，加强海洋生态保护是实现高质量发展的生命线。防城港市持续加强海洋生态文明建设，制定并实施了《防城港市美丽海湾保护与建设实施方案》《防城港市海上环卫制度》《防城港市自然岸线管理办法（试行）》，全面推行湾长制改革，大力开展海洋生态保护和修复工程，近岸海域生态环境质量不断提升。
如今，沿着防城港的海岸线行走，从东湾到西湾，再到北仑河口，成片的红树林一眼望不到边，海上绿波翻涌、鸥鹭翩飞，壮阔而美丽。
“保护区总面积3000公顷，有林面积约1012.25公顷，共有红树植物18种，占全国红树植物的一半，生物多样性保护成效显著。”广西北仑河口国家级自然保护区宣教科研科副科长汤乔说，优良的生态环境让保护区成为候鸟的天堂，每年飞抵或者途经保护区的鸟类超过10万只。近年来监测到的鸟类达304种，其中包含勺嘴鹬、黑脸琵鹭等珍稀濒危物种和小滨鹬、大天鹅等广西首次记录鸟类，监测记录到的鸟类数量居全国保护区前列。
目前，防城港海域拥有红树林面积2000多公顷，是中国首个全球环境基金（GEF）红树林国际示范区。《防城港市西湾红沙环海堤生态化建设案例》入选全球八大海岸带生态减灾协同增效国际案例，成为全球样板。
生态环境的持续改善，让老百姓呼吸清新的空气、喝上干净的水、吃到健康的食品。
长期以来，防城港市坚持不懈打好污染防治攻坚战，全面加强大气面源污染治理，加强饮用水源地和土壤环境保护，深化生态环境领域改革，基本形成“党委领导、政府主导、企业主体、社会参与”的环境治理体系，“防城港蓝”成为一年四季市民津津乐道的常态。
2024年，防城港市入海河流、规模以上入河排污口和入海排污口的水质达标率均为100%；清理各岸线及海上漂浮垃圾7600多吨，垃圾平均覆盖度持续下降。广西盛隆冶金有限公司率先完成了超低排放清洁运输和无组织排放公示，成为广西首个达到这一标准的民营钢铁企业；3家发电企业参与全国碳市场第二个履约周期交易，累计履约清缴配额1955万吨，履约完成率达到100%。
防城港市全面贯彻新发展理念，将碳达峰碳中和纳入生态文明建设整体布局和经济社会发展全局，坚持产业绿色化、绿色产业化，推动传统产业高端化、智能化、绿色化转型升级，创建绿色制造体系示范工作获得自治区工信厅通报表扬，美丽防城港建设取得了明显成效。
截至目前，全市建成国家级绿色园区、自治区级绿色园区1家，实现零的突破；国家级绿色工厂10家、自治区级绿色工厂15家；累计有3家企业的产品获得自治区级绿色设计产品称号。
“2024年，防城港市空气质量优良天数比率98.9%，排全区第一。地表水水质、集中式饮用水水源地水质优良率均为100%。近岸海域水质面积优良率排全区第一。”防城港市市长邱明宏作政府工作报告时说，防城港市将继续聚力全面绿色转型发展，打好污染防治攻坚战，持续推进防城江、北仑河等重点流域生态保护治理，推进海洋生态保护修复工程、饮用水水源地保护工程等项目建设，实施好绿色经济示范行动，加大工业节能降碳技术改造，大力推进美丽防城港建设。

author: Joseph McCarty
title: Flights between Lincoln and Houston to end in May
text: Flights between Lincoln and Houston to end in May LINCOLN, Neb. (KLKN) — United Airlines announced Thursday that its ending flights between Lincoln and Houston. The change will take effect on May 23. But the airline said it plans to add more flights to and from Denver and Chicago. SEE ALSO: [Lincoln Airport working nonstop to keep runway and taxiway clear of snow] Direct service between Nebraska’s capital and the nation’s fourth-largest city [started in September 2022](https://www.klkntv.com/lincoln-airport-announces-direct-united-airlines-flights-to-houston/). The Lincoln Airport said in a statement that those flights were 85% full in 2023. “It’s disappointing to learn the airline has decided to discontinue the route, however we are very grateful United Airlines is dedicated to Lincoln by adding in additional flights to Denver and Chicago, which adds capacity to LNK as well as working towards bringing in larger aircraft for our community,” the airport said. SEE ALSO: [Lincoln Airport examines next steps after Red Way failure] The announcement comes in the wake of the collapse of Red Way. The charter service [began offering flights](https://www.klkntv.com/lincoln-airport-announces-flights-to-seven-new-cities/) from Lincoln to seven cities in June. [It shuttered](https://www.klkntv.com/lincoln-airline-red-way-shutting-down-at-end-of-month/) less than three months later. Nebraska State Auditor Mike Foley said the airline [failed to properly reimburse customers for canceled flights](https://www.klkntv.com/a-failed-riverboat-gamble-nebraska-auditor-slams-red-way-debacle/). SEE ALSO: [Red Way customers still wait for refunds as Lincoln Airport Authority gets final payment] Local governments had provided more than $3 million to the startup, which Foley called a “failed riverboat gamble.” Once the Houston service ends, Denver and Chicago will be the only direct destinations from LNK.

author: StuartMcNight
title: #31 Prohibida toda actividad al aire libre en Mallorca, epicentro de las tormentas: "Lo peor de la DANA está por llegar"
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#1](c1#c-1) no importa, es (de momento) actividad individual, no debería estar afectado pueden seguir jugando. Eso si, solo limitado a 4 guiris mirando
[#2](c2#c-2)
Siempre les quedará el consuelo de irse a Asturias de vacaciones.
Al pais vasco que no vayan pues no se folla, se come mal y está todo carisimo.
[#2](c2#c-2) Por una parte los aviones no pueden venir, pero los que estan tampoco pueden irse...:P
[#14](c14#c-14) Relacionada:
Boya en Dragonera registra el récord de temperatura del agua en el Mediterráneo (X) [#14](c14#c-14) una de las cosas más características del clima mediterráneo son los episodios de lluvias torrenciales al final del verano, aunque es verdad que tradicionalmente suceden en septiembre
[#24](c24#c-24) De Mayo a Octubre te sobran los dedos de una mano.
Pero, eso si, esos dias lo hace a conciencia.
[#14](c14#c-14) Han sido 2 días.
El año pasado paso lo mismo en fechas similares.
Yo recuerdo tormentas similares durante los 20 y pico veranos que vivi ahi. Lo que no hacia era tanto calor. Eso es innegable. Pero tormentas eran habituales.
Esta noticia ya era antigua cuando se ha enviado. La prohibición la mandaron ayer para el dia de hoy. De hecho la noticia lo deja claro:
Los efectos más adversos de la Depresión Aislada en Niveles Altos (DANA) que afecta a Baleares tendrán lugar en la isla de Mallorca desde las nueve de la mañana y hasta las 15:00 horas del jueves, 15 de agosto.
Las 15:00 del jueves 15 de agosto ya habian pasado a las 18:32 de hoy cuando se ha enviado
